alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 6:58PM CDT until May 07 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Rooks County in north central Kansas... Phillips County in north central Kansas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 657 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Edmond, or 17 miles southeast of Norton, moving east at 45 mph. Blowing dust ahead of the storms may result in reductions to visibility. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts, quarter size hail and blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Logan around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Speed, Phillipsburg, Glade, Kirwin and Agra. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
